oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Shelby Foote
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; Foote, Shelby; authors; books; 1970s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Note on Back: "1975 -- Memphis author Shelby Foote, left, opened National Library Week activities with a discussion of the Civil War at Main Library on Sunday, April 13. Here he is taking time to autograph one of his books, SHILOH."
